New Records: Cape Verde upset Ghana with a stoppage-time winner to go top of Group B at the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations.
Key Match Events: Jamiro Monteiro had put the islanders ahead
Alexander Djiku did equalise with a stooping header
Ghana keeper Richard Ofori made two big saves before Rodrigues pounced to grab victory
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cape Verde upset Ghana with a stoppage-time winner
Garry Rodrigues tapped into an empty net in the 92nd minute
Others: Ghana vs Cape Verde match was played on 2024-01-14
The match was part of the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations
